snippet.textDisplay:
Y'know... When Bernie says war is a horror, he is absolutely right. It takes an incredible toll on the soul of those with any conscience and empathy... any human. So when soldiers come back from combat and particularly prolonged combat away from their beloved ones and they've lost comrades or loved ones, that takes an incredible toll on them.

Now imagine the same except for the other side, when because of American military superiority, the death and destructive toll abroad is about 10 or 20 to one enemy combatants to american soldiers deaths and dismemberments; AND THEN the truly horrific innocent civilian non-combatant toll where hundreds of thousands of innocents are killed and many more are maimed.

Bernie Sanders understands that.

snippet.textDisplay:
This operates in a few different ways. We should distinguish between the actual incident being addressed and the constitutional precedent being set: even if there is no real danger of large-scale war with Iran, what Sanders is doing is aimed at reaffirming the role of Congress vis a vis the Executive. I suspect this is aimed more at fixing the U.S. system in general than it is at avoiding a war with Iran (which, I think Bernie and I agree, is not actually all that likely). Additionally, of course, one must consider the PR value of taking such a stance - anyone who fears war with Iran will see Bernie as an ally.

On a personal note: I do not fear war with Iran - but that's OK, because Bernie's already my ally ;)
snippet.textOriginal:
This operates in a few different ways. We should distinguish between the actual incident being addressed and the constitutional precedent being set: even if there is no real danger of large-scale war with Iran, what Sanders is doing is aimed at reaffirming the role of Congress vis a vis the Executive. I suspect this is aimed more at fixing the U.S. system in general than it is at avoiding a war with Iran (which, I think Bernie and I agree, is not actually all that likely). Additionally, of course, one must consider the PR value of taking such a stance - anyone who fears war with Iran will see Bernie as an ally. 

On a personal note: I do not fear war with Iran - but that's OK, because Bernie's already my ally ;)

snippet.textDisplay: They should have amended the constitution instead of just passing the war powers act.  Amending the constitution really went out of style after WW2.  Technically the constitution overrides laws. The war powers act was passed during the cold war in case of nuclear war because president wouldn't have time to ask congress from authorization.  The war powers act has been followed since it was passed and congress has never declared war since it's passing.  If Bernie wants to go back 80 years they should just repeal that law or get a court to rule that law unconstitutional.
snippet.textOriginal: They should have amended the constitution instead of just passing the war powers act.  Amending the constitution really went out of style after WW2.  Technically the constitution overrides laws. The war powers act was passed during the cold war in case of nuclear war because president wouldn't have time to ask congress from authorization.  The war powers act has been followed since it was passed and congress has never declared war since it's passing.  If Bernie wants to go back 80 years they should just repeal that law or get a court to rule that law unconstitutional.

snippet.textDisplay:
What lies is this conflict based on? Trump wants transparency... he calls for the documents to be declassified and released to the public... it isn't Republicans trying to keep the facts out of the public eye. And Colbert conveniently left out of his "recap" the part where we didn't draw first blood... and there is more information we don't know about. Instead he just starts off with the U.S. drone strike, as if we initiated aggression, and Iran is merely retaliating... rather than the other way around. And the Iranian people have turned against those in power of their country... they might have a better read on the situation.

If Trump didn't retaliate, democrats would call him weak, and how that puts us at risk. And Trump knows full well the negative impact of frivolously starting a conflict... why would he risk that with the election coming up? It's probably because it wasn't a frivolous act... their may very well be a legitimate justification for it. Furthermore, Trump has demonstrated that he isn't just some war monger, like hawks like Hillary, he made steps towards diplomacy with North Korea, he didn't poke the bear, and try to start conflicts then, so what is different now?

He was right about the trade deals with China... he was right about North Korea... he was right about ISIS... he was right about the Economy. And citizens of those nations praise Trump because they understand real oppression, because they are experiencing it, and they see Trump's policies for what they are, solutions to oppression. Nothing but success, but liberals still want the opposite.

snippet.textDisplay: Who will vote for Sen. Sanders? Only the ignorant - some of them young voters, interpreting history from a global citizen perspective - "we will be a happy world, if all conflict can be stopped by super liberalism!"   But, and this is the wake-up call: if all restrictions are put aside, especially moral restrictions - the present civilization will cave in, and a power will step in that will control the lawless masses with unprecedented policing ... the enemy of freedom knows that the doing away of moral standards gradually topples any regime (e.g. The Roman Empire [the powerful empire], e.g. whenever Israel abandoned their moral laws they went into exile ... ) - and reluctance to show the military muscle of the United States is a sure sign of working towards the downfall of the United States of America  -  dissolving America by the power of globalism!  Look out for the subtle traitors!

snippet.textDisplay: I like Bernie, lot of respect to Bernie, there is no one else in the Democratic candidacy that I would even give 10 minutes of my time to listen to, much less vote for. But honestly, how does it go? Yes, it is only on the brink of war or a great tragedy, that our country would come together and stand united.. 100% proven fact! The problem is its not the people that are so divided, its the leaders of our nation that have been spewing the bullshit propaganda for nearly 4 years now ensuring that they will stay divided trying to divide us and make ppl pick sides. How in the hell are you going to tell leaders of other countries to sit down and work it out when you cant even get the leaders of your own party to work it out?? And then tell us Trump isn't willing to make a deal, isn't willing to work it out? He wrote the Art of the DEAL.  The one person who is for damn sure willing to negotiate as long as its fair grounds is Donald Trump that's a fact. IF you ppl want to save the democratic party you need to cut the shit and come together now, not after a war has broken out.

snippet.textDisplay:
I am an Iranian PhD candidate in Canada. I am writing you to express my opinion and feelings on the recent Iran-USA tension and the tragic consequences as a result of this ever growing tension. I occasionally watch the Late Shows or Jake Tapper’s program. I have got to know how ignorant the large portion of American population is and how arrogance the has become the backbone of both democrats and republicans when it comes to dealing with other countries. I am saying this as a non-religious Iranian citizen who has left his beloved country and family because, I, like most Iranians hate the Islamic Republic regime. But the question is, do we like the United States political agenda and how they have been behaving throughout the history?

Why instead of interviewing the liars in the governments of both countries, do not you interview the ordinary people?! Millions of Iranians have been suffering and being killed in the past 40 years due to the decisions made by a small number of people at both sides. Disproportionally at a much smaller scale thousands of American lives have been impacted, mostly related to the wars in Iraq and Afghanistan. Yet, the only people who are given the major platforms to speak and tell their lies and propaganda, and plant wrong beliefs in public’s head are those liars and killers.

Both the US government (in the past 40 years) and the Islamic Republic regime have the blood of millions of people on their hands. Their actions has isolated the great Iranian people both at home and even overseas, wasted trillions of dollars which could have been used for the prosperity of humanity, has given rise to the extremists, has opened up a great opportunity for the Russian and Chinese governments to take advantage of Iran and suck up all the resources of Iran in return for their support. See where we are today, never closer to a tragic war.

As the US Defence Secretary said on CNN “Our goal is to protect American people”. Yes, at the expense of innocent lives of people from other countries!? I have always hated bloody revolutions, civil wars and violence, but I have reached to a point that there is almost no way of people getting the control of their nations back without bloody revolutions, civil wars and violence. The US sanctions and travel bans on Iranians have impacted ordinary Iranians’ lives (over %90) who most of them hate the current regime. Then, after all the US governments have done to the Iranians, the US president gets on social media and write in Persian how they support Iranians, after threatening to bomb their cultural sites! Yet, those are the people who are given the major platforms to speak!

I am so sick of the path we are taking. People no longer have any power whatsoever, not just because of the politicians. But mainly because the majority of people do not use their conscious anymore, their are fed with lies and have become numb to many things. As soon as a tragic event occurs, they all become interested in the topic just because they do not want to fall behind to show off their care on the social media. People who did not know where Iran is on the map or how the culture and the history is, all the sudden start posting things on the social media. Let me tell you, if none of those killed in the passenger plane was not a dual citizen of Canada and European countries, nobody would even know about it. The examples of hypocrisy and pretentiousness are countless but of course, today a large portion of western world’s population is more interested in following what the celebrities did, whom they dated, what the newest Netflix show is and etc.

Russia’s interference with the US election has been one of the main ingredients of all the TV shows and a great deal of investigations by the political parties and rage from public. Why?!!!! The US has been meddling with every single country including but not limited to elections, regime change and military actions but everyone has to be ok with it and not much talk about it. But, when it comes to other countries doing the same, then it is something unacceptable. One of the main reasons Iran’s path has changed and resulted in the current system is because of 1953 Iranian coup deta which was the overthrow of the democratically elected Prime Minister Mohammad Mosaddegh orchestrated by the United States and the United Kingdom.

For example, no American or news network talks about the Iran Air passenger Flight that was shot down on 3 July 1988 by an SM-2MR surface-to-air missile fired from USS Vincennes of the United States Navy. The aircraft, an Airbus A300, was destroyed and all 290 people on board, including 66 children, were killed. The jet was hit while flying over Iran's territorial waters in the Persian Gulf. Unfortunately, not many people know these facts because the media does not pay attention to anything unless is American or European lives. The killing of Soleimani was the best gift to the Iran’s dictators. Now, even Iranian people who have been opposing the Iranian regime and the Revolutionary Guard, are leaning towards them and grow anger towards the US. Now, the dictators have a justification to actually develop nuclear weapons to defend for their survival.

Thanks,
A human

No one has ever said they wanted or will go to war with Iran. It has been said we do not want war with Iran and have taken steps to ensure we do not go to war.
This guy says he will do everything in his power to ensure that the US does not go to war. I sure would like to know what position he is in to even have any control of that.
Sanders has his head so far up his butt and talks like a guy with a paper a hole that I find it hard to believe anyone would follow him in anything he says. He is so far out of touch with reality and lives in a make believe world He acts like President Trump makes these calls all on his own without any intelligents behind it.
Again we are looking at a senator that also attacks and says the things he just said about the President of the USA the way he just did should be arrested for treason and throw out of office. It is ok to say you disagree with his position on things but to personally attack and say those things is way wrong. Is it not what you guys call bullying and all cry for safe spaces about?
Like it or not this is the reason America is the way it is today is because the way so called leaders talk the way they do.
It is ok cause not only the USA and the world sees how these people act and when they start getting voted out of office for the way they act will show what is the right and wrong way to talk and act in office.
I am glad President Trump got voted in cause it sure does show the Democrats true colors.

snippet.textDisplay: "Avoid war"! But war is America's biggest export. What are they gonna do instead Bernie?
snippet.textOriginal: "Avoid war"! But war is America's biggest export. What are they gonna do instead Bernie?

snippet.textDisplay:
I am no pacifist, no military hater. I was born on an Air Force Base to a family with a history of service that includes a Revolutionary War hero. Generations of service, multiple reinlistments while serving in active war zones, families damaged by returning soldiers whose minds were never again at peace. My Father, fought in WWII and Korea, dead by suicide at 43, was never truly sane after WWII. Death and destruction and its companion PTSD are familiar to all of us... that being said. We will never stop the endless cycle of war without acknowledging that we have thrown away lives in Iraq, Afghanistan, Viet Nam and Korea. We gained nothing, snuffed out and ruined lives, lost trillions of dollars, made ourselves into an untrustworthy Nation. Our treaties meaningless, we turn our backs on our allies at a whim, and now we are ruled by a spoiled brat with a horrific inferiority complex at best, a proud narcissistic psychopath at his worst. He does not respect the lives of our brave women and men in uniform, he refused to be one. Yet he professes "Falling in love" with the murderous Kim Jong Un and gives nothing but high praise for the beast that is Putin. Now he provokes Iran. The average citizen in Iran is very much like you and I, educated, freedom-loving and in case you don't realize it, they like America. The average citizen craves the lives we lead, want to be like us, they admire our country.
Don't fall for the rhetoric and piss away more lives and more trillions while collaterally murdering innocent citizens for the perceived sins of their leaders. I hope that the world sees us the same way and forgive us for our leaders evil actions. Bush and Trump, both lying monsters, making endless war in our names. We are less safe because of senseless war. It has to stop. Vote!
